net.danielmor.engine
Class Entity

java.lang.Object
  net.danielmor.engine.Sprite
      net.danielmor.engine.Entity
Direct Known Subclasses:
Ball, Block, Cloud, Living, PowerUp, Tank
public abstract class Entity
extends Sprite

Any "Thing" that is a sprite and exists in the game world. A basic abstraction of a sprite.
